meanings.definition: The greatest amount or degree of something.
meanings.sent1: She always gives her mostests in everything she does.
meanings.sent2: The team put forth their mostests effort in the final game.
meanings.sent3: The cake was decorated with the mostests colorful sprinkles.
meanings.sent4: His mostests dedication to his work is truly admirable.
meanings.sent5: The sunsets in Hawaii are the mostests beautiful I have ever seen.

meanings.definition: The highest in quality or rank.
meanings.sent1: The mostests of the jewelry collection was the diamond necklace.
meanings.sent2: Her mostests painting won first place in the art competition.
meanings.sent3: The mostests dessert on the menu was the decadent chocolate cake.
meanings.sent4: His mostests achievement was winning the prestigious award.
meanings.sent5: The mostests fabric in the store was the luxurious silk.

meanings.sent1: The mostests of the students preferred pizza for lunch.
meanings.sent2: In the vote, the mostests chose option A.
meanings.sent3: The mostests of the day was spent relaxing by the pool.
meanings.sent4: She wore the mostests popular dress to the party.
meanings.sent5: The mostests of the flowers in the garden were in full bloom.
